# objectremover

objectremover is an RStudio addin to assist with clearing objects from the Global environment.

## Installation

You can install the released version of objectremover from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("objectremover")
```

## Example

This is an RStudio add in that should be used interactively.
